title: Robot Framework integration with Visual Testing
description: The Robot Framework package testops-robot allows you to apply Katalon Visual Testing directly in a Robot Framework test case. The package provides you with a simple interface to upload checkpoint images and retrieve comparison results. Status of each Robot Framework test case can be promptly driven by each comparison result returned from Katalon Visual Testing
